name: 3 & 4-Bundle Deals
description:
PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU LET ME KNOW WHAT HAIR AND TEXTURE YOU ARE INTERSTED IN PURCHASING! Make a note or email me at cabelobonito2013@gmail.com. 

100% Virgin Human Hair 
- 1b is virgin and can be dyed/bleached 
- Soft and silky texture 
- Lasts for well over a year when well cared for 
- Can be cut, colored, straightened and curled 
- Everything that you do with your own hair can be done with virgin hair 
- Has NO synthetic mix and NO chemicals! 
- 3.5 ounce bundles 
- Completely organic from color to texture

For a full head, we recommend 3 bundles for up to 24" and 4 bundles for 26" and beyond.
